fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.genealgorithms.points

Class KMeansReduction

  • Object
    • KMeansReduction

  • public class KMeansReduction
extends Object
    This class provides an algorithm to simplify a set of points by KMeans clustering. The algorithm corresponds to a reduction according to the classification of point-set operators from Bereuter & Weibel (CaGIS 2013), i.e. there is still a set of points as output of the algorithm, but fewer points. Two options are possible: either keeping one of the initial points to replace a cluster or replace the cluster by its centroid.
    Author:
    gtouya
